Section.Name: GenericColors
Section.Title: Generic Colors
Section.Color: The default color of backgrounds inside the calendar.
Default color for text inside the calendar.
Faded color for events that have passed.
Text that is an urgent message.
Default link color.
General body color of the calendar.
Color that shows which day is today.
Lighter color that shows which day is today.
Background color for table cells that have a decent amount of content.
Background color for table headers.
Background color for table headers.
Faded color for past events.
Color used to highlight keywords in search results.
Second level header used primarily on update.php.
Third level header used primarily on the changeeevent.php form.

Section.Name: TitleTabs
Section.Title: Title and Tabs
Section.Color: Calendar title displayed to the left of the tabs.
Text color for the navigation tabs that are not selected.
Background color for navigation tabs that are not selected.

Section.Name: FilterNotice
Section.Title: Filter Notice
Section.Description: The colors and background image for a message that appears when the events being displayed are filtered by category or search keyword.
Section.Color: Background color for the filter and search keyword notice box.
Font color for the filter and search keyword notice box.
Faded font color for the filter and search keyword notice box.
Section.Background: Background image for the filter and search keyword notice box (leave blank for no background image).

Section.Name: EventBar
Section.Title: Event Bar
Section.Description: A small bar that appears to the left of an event in day, week view as well as when viewing the event details.
Section.Color: Colored bar displayed to the left of past event summaries
Colored bar displayed to the left of current event summaries
Colored bar displayed to the left of future event summaries

Section.Name: MonthDayLabels
Section.Title: Month Day Labels
Section.Description: Background colors that appear when you mouse over the day numbers in month view.
Section.Color: Background colors that appear when the mouse hovers over the day number in month view.
Background colors that appear when the mouse hovers over the day number in month view.
Background colors that appear when the mouse hovers over the day number in month view.

Section.Name: MonthSpecific
Section.Title: Specific to Month View
Section.Color: Background color for cells in month view that are not for the month currently being viewed.

Section.Name: LittleCalendar
Section.Title: Little Calendar
Section.Description: The little calendar appears in the column.
Section.Color: Color of the border around the current day in the little calendar
Background color for days in the little calendar that are being displayed in the main calendar
Font color for days that are not part of the current month being displayed in the little calendar.
A small line below the S/M/T/W/T/F/S row in the little calendar

Section.Name: DateSelector
Section.Title: Date Selector
Section.Description: The date selector appears below the little calendar in the column.
Section.Color: Background color for the date selector's GO button in the column
Border color for the date selector's GO button in the column

Section.Name: AdminButtons
Section.Title: Admin Buttons
Section.Color: Border color for 'New Event' Admin Buttons
Background color for 'New Event' Admin Buttons
Border color for 'Approve' Admin Buttons
Background color for 'Approve' Admin Buttons
Border color for 'Copy Event' Admin Buttons
Background color for 'Copy Event' Admin Buttons
Background color for 'Delete Event' Admin Buttons
Border color for 'Delete Event' Admin Buttons
